mapper.select: SELECT a.seq , (SELECT b.name FROM brand_list b WHERE 1=1 AND a.brand_list_seq = b.num) as brand , a.name , (SELECT FORMAT(a.price, 0)) as price , (SELECT FORMAT((a.price * (100-discount)/100), 0)) as salePrice , a.regist , (SELECT FORMAT(a.numPurchase, 0)) as numPurchase , a.stock FROM item a WHERE 1=1
